'''Amos Roddy''' is a musician based in Portland, Oregon. He composed the entire soundtrack for Minecraft's [[Chase the Skies]] game drop, which contains the Music Disc [[Music Disc Tears|Tears]].

He is also responsible for composing the soundtrack of other indie games, such as ''[[Wikipedia:Citizen Sleeper|Citizen Sleeper]]'', ''[[Wikipedia:Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector|Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector]]'', ''[[Wikipedia:In Other Waters|In Other Waters]]'', ''[[Wikipedia:Cloud Gardens_(video game)|Cloud Gardens]]'', and ''[[Wikipedia:Kingdom_(video game)|Kingdom]]'' series.
